paper_abstract: This letter presents two high-performance level-converting flip-flops (LCFF) for multi-V-DD systems, indirect precharging flip-flop (IPFF) and multi-supply complementary pass-transistor flip-flop (MCPFF). Employing a simple precharging scheme, IPFF provides high operating speed. MCPFF, on the other hand, provides low power operations by implementing the edge-triggering function with complementary pass transistors. Performance comparison indicates that IPFF operates at the highest speed and MCPFF consumes the lowest power among the seven LCFFs under evaluation.
paper_title: Level converting flip-flops for high-speed and low-power applications
